name: GLADIATORS (Azuna Pixels)
description:
NEW STYLE! This pack contains 13 gladiators willing to fight and save their people. You can use them in different games and platforms.

Gladiators (4 Animations):

  1. Idle
  2. Walk
  3. Defeat
  4. Attack

All gladiators have 7 weapons, giving great variety when fighting each other.

  • Sword
  • Dagger
  • Ax
  • Mace
  • Mace skewers
  • Spear
  • Trident

Soon I will expand with more characters, in this case female!

If you need something, contact me: azunapixels@gmail.com

Do you want to help me keep working and get exclusive rebates on my assets? Go through my PATREON, any help is welcome.

TERMS OF USE:

The purchase of this product is for PERSONAL AND COMERCIAL USE.
